channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa, Mattress, clothes everywhere, 20th September
item.description:
Every two weeks more and more people tip their rubbish here, last week there was a microwave there some furniture, fences from number 68 across and more and more. This morning tons of stuff was tipped here and more during the day while I was gone at work. This is such a problem and is incredibly frustrating having reported this for the past year +

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dewar Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garbage from 151 back overflowing onto our property, 20th September
item.description:
151 back appears to have been an open construction site / crater for the last 3 years while we have lived here. Pictured is just one instance of the construction site mess ending up on our property. Can someone please inspect the site.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington High Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet
